fantasy.title: The Way of Kings
fantasy.desc: In a world ravaged by storms, a group of warriors must fight for control and survival.

fantasy.desc: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne in a brutal world filled with dragons, magic, and political intrigue.

fantasy.desc: A master thief leads a band of con artists through a criminal underworld in the city of Camorr.

fantasy.title: The Night Circus

romance.desc: Elizabeth Bennet navigates society, romance, and family pressures while dealing with the enigmatic Mr. Darcy.

romance.title: Wuthering Heights
romance.desc: A passionate and destructive love story between Catherine Earnshaw and Heathcliff that spans generations.

romance.title: Outlander
romance.desc: A nurse from 1945 is mysteriously transported back in time to 18th century Scotland and falls in love with a Highland warrior.

romance.desc: Two teenagers with cancer meet and fall in love, embarking on a journey to understand life and loss.

romance.title: The Notebook
romance.desc: A couple’s love story, beginning in the 1940s, is rekindled in their old age as they reflect on their years together.

western.desc: Two retired Texas Rangers embark on a dangerous cattle drive.

western.desc: A cowboy falls in love while working as a foreman on a Wyoming ranch.

horror.desc: The story of Count Dracula’s attempt to move from Transylvania to England in order to spread the undead curse.

horror.desc: A scientist creates a living being from body parts, only to regret his actions.

horror.desc: A man and his family are terrorized by supernatural forces while staying at a remote hotel.

horror.title: The Call of Cthulhu
horror.desc: A man discovers an ancient, god-like creature threatening humanity.

horror.title: Pet Sematary
horror.desc: A family’s new home hides dark secrets related to an ancient burial ground.

classic.desc: The obsessive quest of Captain Ahab to hunt down the white whale, Moby Dick.

classic.desc: The romantic entanglements of Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy in Regency England.
